Topic.Title: Embeded string variables in the drop down menu.

Posts.EditableText:
Seeing a previous thread I notice and have been using string variables for menu choices as it makes coding a heck of alot easier when you want to add or take away or just plain change a menu option.
I love the drop down menu add and used it in 'wizard'. I would like to see an option for using string variables as a menu choice from the drop down menu as well.
Also I wish there was some way to alter the panes. I know I ask alot lol.
Wonderjudge. (aka Tim Hamilton)
